name: Clustdoc Client portal
author: Clustdoc

sections.description:
Clustdoc provides a robust and flexible client portal system that you can easily integrate with your WordPress website.

With Clustdoc client portal plugin, you can handle through your WordPress website any document-based user workflow, such as self-serve loan applications, online submissions, client onboarding, KYC onboarding, vendor registration, and much more.

üöÄWhy you’ll love using Clustdoc plugin:

  • It takes only 2 minutes to set up (yes we timed it).
  • Deploy industry-specific intake processes through your WordPress portal.
  • Increase website-visitors qualification and conversion.
  • Automatically receive online submissions and build a pipeline of submissions you can easily review and approve.

Not yet a Clustdoc user? Enjoy a 7-day FREE trial (No credit card required) today and launch your first client-facing workflow on your WordPress website tomorrow.

Key features include:

  • Branded and secure client portal
  • Client onboarding checklist (online forms, file request, econtracts, identity verification module and more..)
  • Shared inbox for clients and teams
  • Ready-to-use process templates
  • Guest access for stakeholders
  • Automated reminders and due dates
  • Approval workflows
  • A free client management mobile app
  • API Access (1500+ integrations)
sections.installation:
1. Visit the Plugin directory page, and search for ‚ÄòClustdoc‚Äô or ‚ÄòClustdoc client portal‚Äô.
  2. Install and Activate the plugin.
    ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: If you‚Äôre using the version 1.x of this plugin, please create a new Clustdoc portal BEFORE updating this plugin.
    After activating the plugin
  3. Go to plugin settings page
  4. Enter your Clustdoc API Key. (No coding required, just create a Token and copy/paste it into your WordPress plugin settings)
    You can find it in your Clustdoc account by clicking Clustdoc Developers in your Account team settings tab.
  5. Validate the key and head over to the page or post where you‚Äôd like to insert the portal
    Inserting the client portal to a page or post
  6. Insert the Clustdoc Portal block into your page.
  7. Select the portal you want to display.
  8. Refresh your page.
  9. Go to preview and check the portal.
    Need help? We‚Äôre here to help, Contact us
sections.faq:
I need help setting up my Clustdoc portal

Please visit these quick links:
Register to a free Clustdoc trial account
Build your onboarding process

How many portals can I install?

1 Clustdoc Process= 1 Clustdoc portal access and they are unlimited, you could add for examples 10 processes: each on a page of your website. Depends on your services/processes and needs.
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • New version of Clustdoc plugin totally revamped
  • Use of new Clustdoc portals
  • Use of Gutenberg (WP blocks)
  • If you’re using the version 1.x of this plugin, please be sure you’re using [Clustdoc portals] (https://clustdoc.com/app/portals “Portals”) BEFORE updating this plugin.

1.1

  • Bug fixes.

3.0

  • three version

4.0

  • Improve navigation and update core API

4.1

  • Improve documentation
  • Changes banners
